document_data.name: The Courageous
document_data.mainbody: '''The Courageous''', or '''Abd al-Jari''', was a group of [[faris|farisan]] who fought for the [[Preachers]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{cite book/Assassin Mountain/Holy Slayer Sourcebook|17}}
document_data.Base of Operations: The Courageous were based in the fortress of [[Sarahin]] located deep within the [[Haunted Lands]].
document_data.Activities: This group served the [[holy slayer]]s of the Preachers as a source of muscle when needed.
document_data.Members: All of the members of the Courageous were [[dwarves]]. Their commander was [[Mamoud ibn Asra]].
